Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: May Monsalve
Reviews.Content: Small phone (good size for my mother), great features and comfortable. No regrets about gettin' this. Also the price was the best

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Kerwin A.
Reviews.Content: It's a great phone love it will recommend buying it for yourself of a friend or a relative they will love it

Reviews.Title: Very good phone
Reviews.Author: Jose Pequeno "Peq"
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. I have an Xperia Ion, and this one is like my tablet :), and the optimus L3 is my phone for heavy use, the battery keeps charge abaout 2 days with wifi, bluetooth, 3g, GPS on, when I drive use with waze, read my emails, etc, etc. Is very good to carry on, very compact.The resolution is not to see movies, pictures, etc, is a phone to have an excelente mobility and for mobile work.

Reviews.Title: Does not work
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Enriquez "For an open world"
Reviews.Content: The celphone only restart and restar always, It doesn't work, can't do a single call or open the menu, terrible!!! Not recommended!

Reviews.Title: Nice phone large screen good price
Reviews.Author: Mark V. Epelbaum "Mordechi"
Reviews.Content: This phone is perfect for me it has a big screen slim modern design and a very responsive touchscreen. Now I can do all my business on the move, because of the features that come with the phone. The WiFi is very easy to set up just a touch of the button. The best thing is that I just popped in my SIM and the phone was ready to use.thank you!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
